item.title: Technical considerations in starting this blog
item.description: Places for writing that I considered were: Jekyll Found via this HN post (which also inspired me to start blogging) I don’t have any experience with Ruby At time of writing has 44k stars on github “jekyll is useful for people used to php world” -JC 2022 Wordpress Clunky and not customizable enough for me My wife writes a wordpress blog in estonian about books ;) Medium Allows you to earn money by writing Paywalls your posts ðŸ¤” Hugo Written in go (which i have experience in) Fast (allegedly) At time of writing has 56k stars on github Comment section solutions considered were: Disqus Seemed too shady Links with Github accounts Cactus Seemed cool Allows anonymous comments out of the box Hosting solutions considered were: Freetier aws + nginx Free Probably handles traffic unless blog blows up Some CDN (e.
